title: The West Wing Has Left Max — Here’s How You Can Still Watch the Political Drama Online
description: The West Wing was quietly removed from Max during the final days of 2024, meaning bingers might be left scrambling for how to finish watching the series online in the new year. Below, we’re breaking down how you can still watch the acclaimed political drama online — albeit for a price. Where to Watch The […]
author: Claire Franken
excerpt: 'The West Wing' is no longer streaming on Max — here's how to watch Seasons 1-7 online.
text: All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes. The West Wing was quietly removed from Max during the final days of 2024, meaning bingers might be left scrambling for how to finish watching the series online in the new year. Below, we’re breaking down how you can still watch the acclaimed political drama online — albeit for a price. Since leaving Max, you might be wondering: Is The West Wing streaming anywhere? The answer, sadly, is no — not for free, at least. The West Wing is not currently available to stream on any major platform, but you can purchase individual episodes and complete seasons online on Prime Video. Seasons 1-7 are available to purchase for $29.99 each, while individual episodes go for $2.99 each. (You do not need a Prime Video subscription to purchase The West Wing.) If you have a DVD or Blu-ray player, you can also purchase physical copies of the series online to watch The West Wing from the comfort of your own home. The complete series can be purchased on Amazon in Blu-ray or DVD format, including 156 episodes across 28-42 discs. Plus, by purchasing this complete collection, you get bonus West Wing content including commentaries, unaired scenes and more. Where to Watch The West Wing Online for Free There is not currently an option to watch The West Wing online for free. Should The West Wing be added to another streaming platform in the future, you might be able to watch it for free online by enjoying a free trial period. Keep checking back here for all The West Wing streaming updates. How Many Seasons Are There in The West Wing? The West Wing debuted in 1999 and ran seven seasons on NBC. The drama followed the staff of a fictional Democratic administration during its two terms in the White House. It won 26 Emmys along the way, including Outstanding Drama Series four years in a row. (It’s true, kids, network shows used to win Best Drama.) The West Wing Cast The West Wing cast included Martin Sheen (who played President Jed Bartlet), Allison Janney (chief of staff C.J. Cregg), Bradley Whitford (deputy White House chief of staff Josh Lyman), Dulé Hill (Bartlet’s personal aide Charlie Young), Richard Schiff (communications director Toby Ziegler) and Janel Moloney (senior assistant to the deputy chief of staff Donna Moss) — most of whom recently reunited on stage at the 2024 Emmys. The cast also included Rob Lowe, Stockard Channing, Joshua Malina, Mary McCormack, Alan Alda, Kristen Chenoweth and John Spencer.
html:
All products and services featured are independently chosen by editors. However, TVLine may receive a commission on orders placed through its retail links, and the retailer may receive certain auditable data for accounting purposes.

The West Wing was quietly removed from Max during the final days of 2024, meaning bingers might be left scrambling for how to finish watching the series online in the new year. Below, we’re breaking down how you can still watch the acclaimed political drama online — albeit for a price.

Since leaving Max, you might be wondering: Is The West Wing streaming anywhere? The answer, sadly, is no — not for free, at least. The West Wing is not currently available to stream on any major platform, but you can purchase individual episodes and complete seasons online on Prime Video. Seasons 1-7 are available to purchase for $29.99 each, while individual episodes go for $2.99 each. (You do not need a Prime Video subscription to purchase The West Wing.)

If you have a DVD or Blu-ray player, you can also purchase physical copies of the series online to watch The West Wing from the comfort of your own home. The complete series can be purchased on Amazon in Blu-ray or DVD format, including 156 episodes across 28-42 discs. Plus, by purchasing this complete collection, you get bonus West Wing content including commentaries, unaired scenes and more.

Where to Watch The West Wing Online for Free

There is not currently an option to watch The West Wing online for free. Should The West Wing be added to another streaming platform in the future, you might be able to watch it for free online by enjoying a free trial period. Keep checking back here for all The West Wing streaming updates.

How Many Seasons Are There in The West Wing?

The West Wing debuted in 1999 and ran seven seasons on NBC. The drama followed the staff of a fictional Democratic administration during its two terms in the White House. It won 26 Emmys along the way, including Outstanding Drama Series four years in a row. (It’s true, kids, network shows used to win Best Drama.)

The West Wing Cast

The West Wing cast included Martin Sheen (who played President Jed Bartlet), Allison Janney (chief of staff C.J. Cregg), Bradley Whitford (deputy White House chief of staff Josh Lyman), Dulé Hill (Bartlet’s personal aide Charlie Young), Richard Schiff (communications director Toby Ziegler) and Janel Moloney (senior assistant to the deputy chief of staff Donna Moss) — most of whom recently reunited on stage at the 2024 Emmys. The cast also included Rob Lowe, Stockard Channing, Joshua Malina, Mary McCormack, Alan Alda, Kristen Chenoweth and John Spencer.
